control_name: Ensure management GUI listens on secure TLS version
description: As we move towards better encryption capabilities, we need to also ensure GUI access is properly secured.

steps.notes: Set Admin HTTPS SSL versions to TLS 1.3

description: Syslog logging should be configured to send logs to a central system.

steps.notes: Create a Syslog server profile and attach to log settings

control_name: Ensure a separate partition for containers has been created
description: All Docker containers and their data and metadata is stored under /var/lib/docker.

steps.command: Create a separate partition or LVM for /var/lib/docker
